resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.

fields.description:
Description:
While testing KS, Base UI>Views>Map View, I zoomed the view all the way in and started receiving low memory warnings. I then pressed the home button and the console reported a crash. I could not reproduce the crash on the iPad 2 or on the iPad 1 with KS 1.6.2, but I could get the low memory warnings. See attached console output.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS 1.7.0 on iPad 1
2) Navigate to Base UI>Views>Map View
3) Zoom all the way in and watch the console


Result:
Low memory warnings under the right conditions

Expected Result:
No memory warnings

Notes:
DOES NOT OCCUR on iPad 2
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink:  Base UI>Views>Map View, zooming can cause out-of -memory warnings and crash on home button press on iPad
fields.environment: iPad 1 (3.2.2) , Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201105131803, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.X r3ecace11

comments.body: not seen a while, will reopen if we see it again
